column1: # Investment Portfolio Manager - Sample CSV Import File
# This file demonstrates the correct format for importing your portfolio positions.
# REQUIRED COLUMNS (must be present with exact names):
# - Date: Purchase date in M/D/YYYY format (e.g.
# - Quantity: Number of shares (can include decimals for fractional shares)
# - Portfolio: Portfolio name (portfolios are created automatically if they don't exist)
# - Tickers are automatically converted to uppercase
# - Multiple lots of the same ticker are allowed (separate purchases)
# - Delete these comment lines (starting with #) before importing

column2: see docs/guides/csv-import.md or visit the Help page in the app.
